findings.title: PVC - Price Volatility Concern
findings.description: The contract accumulates tokens from taxes and swaps them for ETH, which can lead to price volatility.

findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The use of SafeMath library is redundant as Solidity versions greater than or equal to 0.8.0 have native arithmetic operations that replace the SafeMath library.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: State variables can be declared as immutable to save gas and improve efficiency.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not follow the Solidity naming conventions, which can affect readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Events are not properly included in the contract, which can cause issues with arithmetic operations.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code is present in the contract, which can increase the size of the contract and deployment costs.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables are not properly checked for zero values, which can lead to unexpected behavior or errors.

findings.title: L17 - Usage of Solidity Assembly
findings.description: The use of assembly code can be error-prone and difficult to read.
